it is the best single player puzzle game ever!!!!!!!!

This game made me appreciate what video games are supposed to be, what they once were.  A good challenge. Most games nowadays are made to be beaten easily, so you will want more, but this game stretched my imagination to unimaginable lengths. It made me think, not to mention the amazingly well thought out story that kept me entertained throughout the whole game, as well as making me want more. Portal 2 was a truly amazing experience that made me love it characters and all their well thought out depth, and made me think in ways that, in our day and age, are not possible.
This is the BEST game ever made and it is what all video game developers should judge their games off of, as it is what all video games should be.

What else can be said that hasn't been already? Challenging puzzles, charming humor, and an engaging story make this a great game for anyone's collection. I reccommend playing Portal 1 first to get the most from the story.

Portal 1 was a unique, super-fun puzzle game with hilarious narration, albeit minimal storyline.

Portal 2 does an outstanding job adding a few more characters and a plot to go with its brain-teasers, making for a highly entertaining (attempted) escape from Aperature Laboratories that alternates between fun problem-solving and great dialogue.

Also has a very fun co-op mode with separate story/characters from single-player.

This game is just one of the best games Valve has to offer.

Hiring the team from Tag: The Power of Paint and having Wheatley, Chell, GLaDOS, and the adorable turrets combined in one game about physics and portals, this game has to be the best puzzle game ever out there.

If you haven't bought this yet, you have missed out on a very good experience. Trust me, its a great game, and worth your money.

By far the best puzzle game ever. 

It has great level design that gradually gets harder, accompanied with very smooth gameplay. The story is phenomenal, with strong characters that will make you laugh, cry & taunt you, a great sequal to the original portal. 

It improves on portal by implementing co-op to repeatidly throw your friends into the unknown as you try to trust each other. It also has a great modding scene which adds a huge amount of community made levels, ontop of the hours of gameplay that already exists.

[h1]The best of its kind![/h1]

Portal 2 is easily the best puzzle game I have ever played, you may think that im kidding because i've only played 2.6 hrs of the game but that's due to the switch of my computers. This game includes knowledge, and you need to have fairly good knowledge of angles, reflexes and puzzling. I am not a very good puzzler myself but this game is still, the best. Hopfully this helped you in the process of thinking to buy the game during the quick sale that is going on right now.

Virkelig dårligt spil!
Alt for meget "biograf" og rigtig rigtig mange minutter hvor man bare skal sidde og vente imens spillets 2 fiktive figurer taler til hinanden.
Alt for meget forudbestemt hvor du egentlig bare skal løbe efter en af spillets figurer som guider dig om du skal til højre eller venstre. Det bliver MEGET HURTIGT ensformet og meget kedeligt.
Spillets individuelle missioner er somsådan egentlig godt nok, og man skal til tider lige tænke en enkelt gang eller to over hvordan man klarer missionen. Men meget kedeligt man kun kan klarer hver eneste mission på én måde. Lidt variation og individualisme ville slet, SLET ikke skade spillet.
Jeg vil IKKE anbefale at købe det til 20 euro - jeg købte det på tilbud til 5 euro, så tabet er til at bære.
Efter at have spillet i 3 timer, hvoraf den ene time var biograf og guide, har jeg klaret halvdelen af spillet (chapter 7).....
Der står man kan downloade baner som andre end Valve har lavet - så det var måske en mulighed.

Jeg har ikke haft mulighed at spille spillet på multiplayer - så det kan jeg ikke udtale mig om.
i don't even need to give an explanation to why this game is amazing. SO JUST BUY IT!

首先，请你抛弃掉你对FPS游戏“血腥暴力哲学”的固有思想吧，在光圈科技里头，哥们，你的手中的那把破枪是无法直接让你突突突杀人滴！V社创造的这款游戏，让玩你打开传送门，尽情的挥洒想象力，解决游戏当中遇到的一个有一个有意思，设计巧妙的谜题。引力、反作用力、浮力、空间概念、水流、重力加速度等物理因素都成为了你解决问题的法宝。不仅如此，游戏单人模式的剧情也十分的动人、搞笑，你要知道，V社的游戏从来都是充满各种黑色幽默的，本作拥有一个妙趣横生的故事，等你完成单人游戏部分，我告诉你，这一定是一次难忘的经历。
不仅如此，当你完成了单人部分，接下来等待你的将会是市面上最赞的双人合作游戏之一。V社在合作的关卡部分能让你看到他们对于细节毫不马虎的精神，妙趣横生且欢乐的谜题总之让我这种喜欢突突突的玩家也放弃了杀戮。
最后要点赞的是游戏的配音，配音方面10分不算少其中Stephen Merchant为惠利特（一开始的小圆球）的配音，还有Ellen McLain为GLaDOS的配音以及J.K. Simmons的硬派出演都让游戏的角色声音给人留下了难忘的感觉。
总之，这是一款AMAZING级别的游戏，无论是PC党还是主机党都不容许错过，我相信你也不会错过~
Adore it.
Best game

I thought there would be no way they could do better than the original. I had no idea I could be so wrong. This is one of my favourite games of all time. Every element is great: the writing is exquisite, the puzzles challenging, even the music is awesome. Everyone who likes videosgames should try this game. People who hate videogames should also try this game, as it will likely change their minds.

Puzzle room. Run through corridors. Puzzle room. Run through corridors. Amusing robot. Puzzle room. Run through corridors. Puzzle room. Evil robot tries to kill you. Puzzle room. Run through corridor (or walk if you want the variety). Puzzle room with coloured gels. Backstory via loudspeaker. Puzzle room. Puzzle room. Puzzle room Puzzle room. Puzzle room. Run through corridors. Puzzle room. Corridors. Rooms. Corridors. Rooms. More corridors (but the art direction is quite nice). Oh, there was a plot twist some time before this. A potato. Puzzle room. Corrridor. Crazy robot wants you dead. Helpful robot is helpful. Puzzles puZZles puzZlEs PUZZLEs (all kinds of puzzles, but they all look the same anyway). End of game - presumably. Didn't finish it (try and guess why).

Buy on sale and marvel at how good Left4dead 2 could of looked.

Не пожалел что купил! Отличный трехмерный пазл, чуть проще чем первая часть, но не менее увлекательный. Сюжет сделан на высоте, чего только стоит неожиданный поворот в середине игры. Кооператив так же интересно проходить как и сингл, а в мастерской можно найти кучу карт для интересного времяпрепровождения. Отдельно стоит отметить черный юмор, чего только стоят записи Кейва Джонсона. Все кто играл в первую часть покупайте незамедлительно!

I am very glad that I spent money and time on this game and I am also looking forward to finishing the co-op with my friend!

If you liked the first game, you will love this one. It builds upon success of the previous game, with better puzzles, new game mehanics, etc.

Workshop support is also very welcome since if you are into Portal puzzles, there are just huge amounts of new user content content that has a much higher difficulty compared to the game itself.

Co-op is also a cool addition.

Vorab: ein würdiger Nachfolger. 10/10

Für Portal-Besitzer ist Portal 2 ein must have. Und auch für alle anderen, obwohl man dann an manchen Stellen nicht versteht wieso weshalb warum.

+ GlaDOS/Wheatley machen Portal 2 noch witziger als den Vorgänger
+ Eine "echte" Story
+ stimmiger Soundtrack
+ Passende und gut eingesetzte Erweiterungen (Funktionsflüssigkeiten und Gravitationsstrahl)
+ Ausbruch aus "langweiligen" Testkammern
+ An manchen Stellen knifflig aber doch für jederman zu schaffen

An Portal 2 gibts nichts zu verbessern.

good
Nice game, but too short.

Portal was innovative for its time. Escape Aperture Laboratories by solving puzzles with a gun that shoots interdimensional rifts in space-time. Portal 2 is just like that, except with more plot development.

Return to Aperture yet again, this time guided by a talking blue-eyed personality core who happens to have the same goal as you, all while solving new (and old) tests in your quest to get to the surface.

A great game; I absolutely loved the graphics, soundtrack, storyline, and the two new features: Co-op and Community test chambers! Portal was cool, but the sequel is something else altogether. [b] 9/10 [/b]: I strongly recommend this game to anyone who enjoys puzzles, first-person shooters, plot-twists, and witty humor.

Edit: It's been 5 years since this sequel came out, and in that time, its fanbase has created some of the most amazing, inspiring, heartwrenching, and innovative fanart, test chambers, mods, and fanfiction surrounding a game that I have ever seen (i.e. Blue Sky, Portal Stories: Mel). If you have not played this game by now: do yourself a favor and play. Even if you don't enjoy it, this game is well worth the experience. Happy 5th birthday, Portal 2. =P
